channel.title: Mopman needs a banner!
channel.description:
Hey you awesome graphics people.
I would be mucho happy if somebody could do this for me, as I suck at anything remotely artistic.
Basically, I need the attached image to be turned into something that is usable as a banner at the top of a punbb board. This may involve shrinking it, since it's a bit large.
The banner must contain the title/large words "Falling In Style" - possibly the "Falling" being large and the "in style" being smaller, but I shall leave that up to your artistry. In the bottom right hand corner, the worlds "A Casually Hardcore Guild on Bladefist EU" must be displayed - if this is stupidly long, a contraction like just "Bladefist EU" would be OK.
I can't really tell you how I would want it positioned other than that, or what style the text should be... because I'm dumb when it comes to art. As long as it looks cool/clean and the falling orc in the middle is not covered (very important, somehow the words must be worked around him, hes the focus :P) then I'll be happy.
Btw, resize/crop to your hearts content if the orc needs to be moved or wahtever, as long as it stays reasonably banner sized.
If this post was a bit rambly and gay, sorry, I haven't slept for a very long time and am now going to.
I love you all etc, Mopman

item.title: Mopman needs a banner!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Hey you awesome graphics people.

I would be mucho happy if somebody could do this for me, as I suck at anything remotely artistic.

Basically, I need the attached image to be turned into something that is usable as a banner at the top of a punbb board. This may involve shrinking it, since it’s a bit large.

In the bottom right hand corner, the worlds “A Casually Hardcore Guild on Bladefist EU” must be displayed - if this is stupidly long, a contraction like just “Bladefist EU” would be OK.

I can’t really tell you how I would want it positioned other than that, or what style the text should be… because I’m dumb when it comes to art. If this post was a bit rambly and gay, sorry, I haven’t slept for a very long time and am now going to.

I love you all etc, Mopman
